title: Phone Mobile UI Illustration - Featured Example Project

summary.subhead: Optional subhead, together we can achieve greatness!
summary.caption: Optional / Date: 2023 / Award-winning
text: Notes: you have to structrue each project josn files by following following rules:

1) 'id' is for url querty selector, and will be shown in the url address, could be int or string. (Normally, id should be unique - but we handle duplicated and missing id cases by assign them temp ids)
2) For projects that do not want password protection, you can either set 'password' key to any empty values like null, '', or set to string 'no'

3) Projects have indexOrder 0-9 will be shown as featured project card on the home page. Negative indexOrder will hide project from navigation and card list (accessable by URL). Projects have same indexOrder will sort by filename

article.headline: Early Research
article.subheadCaption: The "property lookup" form can be used to access methods and properties of an object literal's or class's [[Prototype]]. Within a class's body, the reference of super can be either the superclass's constructor itself, or the constructor's prototype, depending on whether the execution context is instance creation or class initialization. See the Examples section for more details.
